net.stemkoski.bagel

Class Label

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.stemkoski.bagel.Entity
      • net.stemkoski.bagel.Label

  • public class Label
extends Entity
    A structure to store and display text. Most properties are public and should be set directly.

    • Field Summary

      Modifier and Type Field and Description

      text alignment ("LEFT", "CENTER", "RIGHT") with respect to anchor point (x,y)

    • Field Detail

      • fontName

        java.lang.String fontName
        Name of the current font. Set in loadFontFromSystem(String, int) or set by file in loadFontFromFile(String, int).

      • fontSize

        int fontSize
        Size of the current font. Set in loadFontFromSystem(String, int) or loadFontFromFile(String, int).

      • font

        javafx.scene.text.Font font
        Automatically set by load methods.

        color used to draw font

        text to display in label

        y-coordinate of anchor of label; see setPosition(double, double)

    • Method Detail

      • loadFontFromSystem

        public void loadFontFromSystem(java.lang.String fontName,
                               int fontSize)
        Configure this label to use a font already installed on this system.
        Parameters:
        fontName - name of font (e.g. "Arial", "Times New Roman", "Courier New"); must be installed on system
        fontSize - size of font

      • loadFontFromFile

        public void loadFontFromFile(java.lang.String fontFileName,
                             int fontSize)
        Configure this label to use a font from a specified file.
        Parameters:
        fontFileName - name of font file
        fontSize - size of font

      • setPosition

        public void setPosition(double x,
                        double y)
        Set the coordinates of the anchor position of this label; this may be to the left, center, or right of the text according to the value of alignment.
        Parameters:
        x - x-coordinate of anchor of label
        y - y-coordinate of anchor of label

      • draw

        public void draw(javafx.scene.canvas.GraphicsContext context)
        Render this text to a canvas used specified parameters.
        Overrides:
        draw in class Entity
        Parameters:
        context - GraphicsContext object that handles drawing to the canvas
